definition: seeking instant benefit (idiom); shortsighted vision, looking only for fast return
urgent/pressing/rapid/hurried/worried/to make (sb) anxious
meritorious deed or service/achievement/result/service/accomplishment/work (physics)
near/close to/approximately
surname Li
sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit

sentences.english: Why to pursue those eager evaluation?
sentences.chinese: 又何必追求那些急功近利的评价？

sentences.english: We are living in an era where everything is rushed too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在生活的时代一切都是那么急功近利。
反而变得急功近利，好高骛远。

sentences.english: May you be more calm when facing the acquisitive society.
sentences.chinese: 愿你在急功近利的社会里多一份淡定与从容。

sentences.english: Some students asked the Prime Minister how to change the attitude of learning in quick success.
sentences.chinese: 有同学向总理提出，如何克服学习中急功近利的问题。

sentences.english: The steel version of the SEAL dive watches was an instant success.
sentences.chinese: 钢版的印章是急功近利潜水器材。

definition: anxious for quick results (idiom); to demand instant success/impatient for result/impetuous
to lack foresight
to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
fickle and impatient/restless/giddy/scatterbrained
to spoil things through excessive enthusiasm (idiom)
lit. to want sth in haste, but cannot get there (idiom, from Analects); more haste, less speed/don't try to run before you can walk
to neglect the root and pursue the tip (idiom)/to neglect fundamentals and concentrate on details
lit. to want to get fat with only one mouthful (proverb)/fig. to try to achieve one's goal in the shortest time possible/to be impatient for success
pinyin: yi1 kou3 chi1 ge5 pang4 zi5

definition: utility
blinded by greed (idiom)
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
to be shortsighted
to act with undue haste (idiom); eager and impatient/overhasty
to seize every opportunity/to be full of tricks
lit. to invert root and branch (idiom); fig. confusing cause and effect/to stress the incidental over the fundamental/to put the cart before the horse
to advance prematurely
